ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is a very good course if youa) want to know how Sociology as a job really works on all kinds of levelsb) would like to find out how people succeed in Sociologyc) want to get to know the department.I would recommend it to anyone as this kind of knowledge is otherwise hard to get at.
A very important part of my first semester. Absolutely recommended.
I would absolutely recommend this course to other students.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It has taught me the things that every Sociology student should know (e.g. publishing a book can take a decade, publishing a good article half a decade, what defines a successfull Sociologists, what are risks that come with the job) but that you cannot find in textbooks.I have also reconsidered my style of presenting after one of the off-week seminars.
